2006820.name: HUMANKIND™ - Music for the Ages, Vol. VI
2006820.description:
HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages albums features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 6 includes the 33 new tracks from the DLC “Cultures of Latin America”, performed by Pierre Hamon and Arnaud Roy. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

[This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game]

33 tracks. 51 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
